rooms.description: A welcoming open space with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
Spacious living area that connects to the entrance hall, featuring industrial design elements.
Functional dining space with an open feel.
Modern kitchen designed with industrial finishes and ample storage.
Cozy study area serving as a library; includes bookshelves and natural lighting.

openings.description: Main entry door leading to the entrance hall.
Balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows offering outdoor access and views.

additional_features.description: Private swimming pool designed with safety measures and Vastu alignment for relaxation.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with ample natural light and industrial detailing.
Primary bedroom for children or guests.
Secondary bedroom with ample storage and privacy.
ensuite bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom.

openings.description: Sturdy industrial staircase connecting both floors with open space below.
